query.statement:
SELECT '0' AS CHK, X.APSTAT APSTAT, X.REDPT1 REDPT1, A.CS143_DOC DOCNO, B.CS144_PJT PJT, B.CS144_HNO HNO, A.CS143_SEQ SEQ, A.CS143_PST PST, H.CTEXT2 PST_NM, D.CS101_HNA HNO_NM, G.ZSPEC2, G.ZSPEC12 ZSPEC1, B.CS144_GND GND, CASE B.CS144_GND WHEN '' THEN '미입주' WHEN 'A' THEN '무상공사' WHEN 'B' THEN '무상일반' WHEN 'C' THEN '유상공사' WHEN 'D' THEN '유상일반' ELSE B.CS144_GND END GND_NM, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('','A','B') THEN (SELECT MAX(KUNNR_NM) FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 WHERE MANDT = B.MANDT AND POSID = B.CS144_PJT) WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('C','D') THEN (SELECT MAX(CS121_NAM) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST121 WHERE MANDT = B.MANDT AND CS121_UPN = B.CS144_UPN AND CS121_CST = B.CS144_CST) ELSE B.CS144_GND END NAM_NM, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('','A','B') THEN (SELECT MAX(ZSITE_NM) FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 WHERE MANDT = B.MANDT AND POSID = B.CS144_PJT) WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('C','D') THEN (SELECT MAX(CS121_SPT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST121 WHERE MANDT = B.MANDT AND CS121_UPN = B.CS144_UPN AND CS121_CST = B.CS144_CST) ELSE B.CS144_GND END SPT_NM, CASE B.CS144_GND WHEN '' THEN '' WHEN 'A' THEN VALUE(E.CS116_BGT,'') WHEN 'B' THEN VALUE(E.CS116_BGT,'') WHEN 'C' THEN VALUE(F.CS126_USD,'') WHEN 'D' THEN VALUE(F.CS126_USD,'') ELSE '' END USD, CASE B.CS144_GND WHEN '' THEN '' WHEN 'A' THEN VALUE(E.CS116_BMT,'') WHEN 'B' THEN VALUE(E.CS116_BMT,'') WHEN 'C' THEN VALUE(F.CS126_UMR,'') WHEN 'D' THEN VALUE(F.CS126_UMR,'') ELSE '' END UMR, CASE B.CS144_GND WHEN '' THEN 0 WHEN 'A' THEN 0 WHEN 'B' THEN 0 WHEN 'C' THEN VALUE(F.CS126_AMT,0) + VALUE(F.CS126_HMT,0) + VALUE(F.CS126_DMT,0) WHEN 'D' THEN VALUE(F.CS126_AMT,0) + VALUE(F.CS126_HMT,0) + VALUE(F.CS126_DMT,0) ELSE 0 END TOT, A.CS143_SEL SEL, A.CS143_GBN GBN, A.CS143_JHD JHD, --A.CS143_FSA FSA, CAST(A.CS143_FSA AS VARCHAR(1050)) AS FSA, A.CS143_REQ REQ, A.CS143_RLT RLT, A.CS143_RMK RMK, A.CS143_HMK HMK, A.CS143_SCP SCP, A.CS143_YMD YMD, A.CS143_UNT UNT, A.CS143_AMT AMT, A.CS143_NEW NEW, A.CS143_HJT HJT, A.CS143_TSA TSA, A.CS143_HDD HDD, A.CS143_HNT HNT, A.CS143_HMT HMT, CASE A.CS143_TSA WHEN '0' THEN (SELECT ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSID = A.CS143_HJT) ELSE A.CS143_HPT END HPT_NM, CASE B.CS144_GND WHEN '' THEN VALUE(B.CS144_PJT,'') WHEN 'A' THEN VALUE(B.CS144_PJT,'') WHEN 'B' THEN VALUE(B.CS144_PJT,'') WHEN 'C' THEN VALUE(B.CS144_UPN,'') WHEN 'D' THEN VALUE(B.CS144_UPN,'') ELSE '' END UPN, I.CTEXT2 ARA_NM, SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(B.MANDT,SAPHEE.GET_LIFNR(B.MANDT,B.CS144_BSU)) BSU_NM, REPLACE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(B.MANDT,'VKGRP',J.VKGRP),'-','') TEM_NM, J.VKGRP TEM, SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(B.MANDT,B.CS144_BPM) EPN, HEX(CURRENT DATE) CDATE, K.J_1KFREPRE NAM, VALUE(C.CS145_ARA,'') CS145_ARA, VALUE(A.CS143_SCD,'') SCD, A.CS143_YM2 YM2, '' GPT, (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = 'ko' AND CODE1 = 'CS129' AND CODE2 = F.CS126_KND) KND_NM, CASE WHEN F.CS126_HYN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END HYN, CASE WHEN F.CS126_DYN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END DYN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_GNO > '' AND CS126_UPN = B.CS144_UPN AND CS126_CST = B.CS144_CST AND CS126_PJT = B.CS144_PJT AND CS126_HNO = B.CS144_HNO AND CS126_GNO = B.CS144_GNO AND CS126_HYN = 'Y' ) CNT_H, CASE B.CS144_GND WHEN '' THEN '무상미개시' WHEN 'A' THEN '무상미개시' WHEN 'B' THEN '무상만료' WHEN 'C' THEN '무상미개시' WHEN 'D' THEN (CASE WHEN F.CS126_SLA = 'Y' THEN '기술용역' ELSE (CASE WHEN F.CS126_KND > '' THEN 'FM' ELSE 'POG' END) END) ELSE '' END GGB, CS111.DIPBXNUMB
, A.CS143_FLG FLG -- 추가(2020.02.17)
, B.CS144_BSU BSU -- 추가(2020.04.07)--자회사 실패등록때문에 추가 , VALUE(A.CS143_IFS,'') AS IFS -- 2021.01.22 Han J.H. 준법지원 요청. 타사보수현황-정보출처코드 , VALUE(A.CS143_IFSV,'') AS IFSV -- 2021.01.22 Han J.H. 준법지원 요청. 타사보수현황-정보출처내용(기타)
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST143 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST145 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS143_SCD = C.CS145_SCD LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 X ON A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND X.DOCKIND ='7' AND A.CS143_DOC = X.DOCNO, SAPHEE.ZCST144 B LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT, CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO, CS116_GNO, CS116_GND, MAX(CS116_BGT) CS116_BGT, MAX(CS116_BMT) CS116_BMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PST = 'A6' -- AND CS116_GNO > '' GROUP BY MANDT, CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO, CS116_GNO, CS116_GND ) E ON B.MANDT = E.MANDT AND B.CS144_PJT = E.CS116_PJT AND B.CS144_HNO = E.CS116_HNO AND B.CS144_GNO = E.CS116_GNO AND B.CS144_GND = E.CS116_GND LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CS126_UPN,A.CS126_CST,A.CS126_PJT,A.CS126_HNO,A.CS126_GNO ,A.CS126_UMR,A.CS126_USD,A.CS126_KND,A.CS126_HYN,A.CS126_DYN ,A.CS126_AMT,A.CS126_SLA, A.CS126_HMT, A.CS126_DMT ,A.MANDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(C.CS126_UMR) CS126_UMR ,MAX(C.CS126_GNO) CS126_GNO ,MAX(A.MANDT) MANDT
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST143 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST144 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS143_SEQ = B.CS144_SEQ INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.CS144_UPN = C.CS126_UPN AND B.CS144_CST = C.CS126_CST AND B.CS144_PJT = C.CS126_PJT AND B.CS144_HNO = C.CS126_HNO AND B.CS144_GNO = C.CS126_GNO AND C.CS126_DDT = '' AND C.CS126_PST = 'A6' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS143_DOC = #DOCNO# ) B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_GNO= B.CS126_GNO AND A.CS126_UMR= B.CS126_UMR AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6'
) F ON B.MANDT = F.MANDT AND B.CS144_UPN = F.CS126_UPN AND B.CS144_CST = F.CS126_CST AND B.CS144_PJT = F.CS126_PJT AND B.CS144_HNO = F.CS126_HNO AND B.CS144_GNO = F.CS126_GNO,
SAPHEE.ZCST101 D LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 AS CS111 ON CS111.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS111.PJT = D.CS101_PJT AND CS111.HNO = D.CS101_HNO, SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 G, SAPHEE.ZLCODE H, SAPHEE.ZLCODE I, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 J, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 K WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS143_SEQ = B.CS144_SEQ AND B.MANDT = D.MANDT AND B.CS144_PJT = D.CS101_PJT AND B.CS144_HNO = D.CS101_HNO AND B.MANDT = G.MANDT AND B.CS144_PJT = G.POSID AND B.CS144_PJT || B.CS144_HNO = G.POSID_1 AND B.MANDT = H.MANDT AND A.CS143_PST = H.CODE2 AND H.CODE1 = 'CS117' AND H.LANG = 'ko' AND B.MANDT = I.MANDT AND B.CS144_ARA = I.CODE2 AND I.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND I.LANG = 'ko' AND B.MANDT = J.MANDT AND B.CS144_BSU = J.LGORT AND J.MANDT = K.MANDT AND J.LIFNR = K.LIFNR AND A.CS143_DOC = #DOCNO# WITH UR
